default.shortDescription: We improve your daily communication and collaboration processes. We work goal-oriented, productive and flexible!
default.featuredTitle: Teams Telephony as a Service with DirectRoute365
featuredParagraphs:
DirectRoute365 is the high available Teams telephony-as-a-service platform by Communicativ to ensure optimal accessibility, continuity and functionality.

With only an internet connection, we facilitate all telephony possibilities including hybrid work and customer contact center scenarios.

Convenient and based on a ‘pay per use per month’ model. DirectRoute365 is available in more than 60 countries via one management platform.

callToAction.title: Successful companies recognize quality!
callToAction.description: Get in touch and learn how we can support your business processes with Microsoft Teams based solutions and offerings.
